= subtype( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments matches an items in-game subtype


== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = string(s) to match

== Remarks ==
  * args must be in the clients language
  * can be found on the debug info menu for that item

== Examples ==

`itemtype( armor ) and subtype( leather )`

`itemtype( gem ) and subtype( yellow )`
